mainSequence.step: User A initiates a transaction on the Polkadot Ledger through the API Client.
The API Client sends a request to the API Server.
The API Server forwards the transaction request to the Polkadot Ledger Connector.
The Polkadot Ledger Connector processes the transaction by calling the transact() method.
The Polkadot Ledger Connector sends a response back to the API Server.
The API Server formats the response.
The API Client receives the formatted response.
